Posts.Content: This is my first time on here.  I have been diagnosed with the above, had MRI. two days ago and got to wait a quick for results of MRI.  Can anyone enlighten me as to what it all means.  Thank you
Posts.Title: IDC2 and high grade Dcis

Posts.Content: Thank you and your support truly helps
Posts.Title: IDC2 and high grade Dcis

Posts.Content: Well I got my MRI results to say that the Tumor is bigger than thought and two inches so now being referred to different hospital for mastcetomy on right breast and reconstruction(another waiting time for date!). Having lymph node biopsy as well I believe so that will be another wait after surgery!! Must say I feel better knowing the ball is rolling and this 'thing' is going to be removed! Felt really tearful yesterday but better today.
Posts.Title: IDC2 and high grade Dcis

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your knowledge and advice.  I have had many sleepless nights but your right, the waiting is the worst thing.  I will keep posting how it goes next week.  Staying positive
Posts.Title: IDC2 and high grade Dcis
